student table

CREATE TABLE `csc12`.`students` ( `id` INT(12) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `matric_no` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `surname` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `first_name` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `middle_name` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `dob` DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `nationality` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `state` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `lga` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `level` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;


admin table

CREATE TABLE `csc12`.`admin` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `username` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `password` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
